inner_join: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table_a}` a INNER JOIN `{table_b}` b ON {on} {where} ORDER BY {orderby} LIMIT {limit}
left_join: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table_a}` a LEFT JOIN `{table_b}` b ON {on} {where}
outter_join: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table_a}` AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN `{table_b}` AS b ON {on}
sub_query_from: SELECT {columns_a} FROM `{table_a}` a, (SELECT {columns_b} FROM `{table_b}` {where_b}) b WHERE {where}
min_max: SELECT min({columns_min}) as minv, max({columns_max}) as maxv FROM `{table}` {where}
upfiles_image: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table}` WHERE extract_id='{extract_id}' AND `is_regi`='1' AND `file_type` LIKE 'image%' ORDER BY `id` ASC LIMIT 1
upfiles: SELECT id,file_type,directory,sfilename,ofilename FROM `{table}` WHERE extract_id='{extract_id}' AND `is_regi`='1' ORDER BY `id` ASC
category1: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table}` WHERE LENGTH(REPLACE(`{field}`,'000',''))='3' ORDER BY `{orderby}` ASC
category2: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table}` WHERE `{field}` LIKE '{q}%' AND LENGTH(REPLACE(`{field2}`,'000',''))='6' ORDER BY `{orderby}` ASC
category3: SELECT {columns} FROM `{table}` WHERE `{field}` LIKE '{q}%' AND LENGTH(`{field2}`)='9' ORDER BY `{orderby}` ASC
